name: Only App
description:
Only is a simple, minimalist and intelligent to-do list created by the Forwwward Team. Whether it's for work, school or home, Only will help you increase your productivity and decrease your stress levels.


This project started as a Proof of concept and then we decided to share it with the community as a freebie.


The next step of this project will be the development of a prototype of this app for user testing.


Download your freebie copy from the Figma Community.
